H

hand - Variable in class blackjack.Dealer
The hand.
Hand - Class in blackjack
This class inherits the class CollectionOfCards and also has two parameters: int total and boolean handCanBeHit.
Hand() - Constructor for class blackjack.Hand
Constructs an empty LinkedList implicitly invoking super() constructor, also sets total to 0 and handCanBeHit to true.
handCanBeHit - Variable in class blackjack.Hand
The hand can be hit.
